Notes: Enter Type (subtitle, caption, audio description, chapters, or metadata) in B2
Enter Language (ISO 639-3 three letter code) in B3
Enter country code (ISO 3166 alpha 2) in B4 and Entity Name in C4
Enter Identifier Type in C5; script assumes filename is Identifier
Originating File will populate from script
Enter File Creator (lastname, firstname if individual; free text if organization) in B7
Enter File Creation Date (ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD) in B8
Optional: Enter Origin History in B10
Use A12 and A13 to change Local Usage Element names
Optional Local Usage Element: Enter value in B12
